text: Phrissoma terricolum is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by James Thomson in 1864. It is known from South Africa.BioLib.cz - Phrissoma terricolum. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1864
title: Phrissoma terricolum
